alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 18 at 12:25AM MST until April 19 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHERN GILA COUNTY... The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds, low relative humidity and high fire danger, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County. * TIMING... Wednesday noon to 6 PM MST. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are rapidly drying and fire danger is high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this fire weather watch.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
